QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, object_groups.id odf_pk, object_groups.CODE as code, object_groups.color as color, CAPTIONS.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, object_groups.position as position, OBJECT_GROUPS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, object_groups.type as type, object_groups.is_default as is_default, OBJECT_GROUPS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from object_groups object_groups inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id JOIN cmn_captions_nls CAPTIONS ON CAPTIONS.pk_id = object_groups.id and CAPTIONS.table_name = 'OBJECT_GROUPS' and CAPTIONS.language_code = user_context.language_code JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=object_groups.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=object_groups.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
